title: Are political issues important from the UPSC point of view? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: No, political issues are not important for UPSC exam point of view but important for you to know the exact political situation city, district, state and Nation. Also you should know the ground reality, behavioural and people's elected leader. I am not saying to lean on every matters of political aspects just a review or glance to face interview questions .

Politics means governance, debates on public interest Upsc solemnly meant for services which are directed from government of India. which are subjected to public interest If there is any problem we people for any region, religion,caste,creed,sex, position we can judicially review against government. So upsc should follow on politicals, But not with respect to individual political policy
